mapper.select: SELECT org_no, private_bal, public_bal, generality_bal FROM wbmp_org_balance WHERE org_no = #{orgId} AND data_dt = DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d' )

SELECT org_no, private_bal, public_bal, generality_bal, DATE_FORMAT( data_dt, '%m月%d日' ) date_str FROM wbmp_org_balance WHERE org_no = #{orgId} AND data_dt BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT( DATE_SUB( CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 30 DAY ), '%Y%m%d' ) AND DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_DATE, '%Y%m%d' ) ORDER BY data_dt
